channel.title: Developer Guide on GDG
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Guide on GDG

item.title: Developer Guide
item.description: Dependencies Development requirements. As gdg is written in go, a current compiler is required. task management tool go-task. Installation Docker for running tests Install the remaining dependencies via: task install_tools

item.title: Contributing
item.description: First of all, gdg contains two binaries. gdg which manages grafana entities and provide some tooling facilities and gdg-generate a tool to help generate dashboards from templates to allow for some more flexible management.
